lines.gurmukhi: dohrw ]
lines.transliteration_english: dhoharaa ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: दोहरा ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Dohira

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਦੋਹਰਾ:

lines.gurmukhi: sviq qRws rwnI AiDk; logn drbu lutwie ]
lines.transliteration_english: savat traas raanee adhik logan dharab luTaae ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: सवति त्रास रानी अधिक लोगन दरबु लुटाइ ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Petrified of the co-wife, she started to squander wealth among people,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸੌਂਕਣ ਦੇ ਡਰ ਕਰ ਕੇ ਰਾਣੀ ਨੇ ਲੋਕਾ ਨੂੰ ਜ਼ਿਆਦਾ ਧਨ ਲੁਟਾਉਣਾ ਸ਼ੁਰੂ ਕਰ ਦਿੱਤਾ।

lines.gurmukhi: qy vw kI sviqh chY; skY n mUrK pwie ]8]
lines.transliteration_english: te vaa kee savatih chahai sakai na moorakh paae ||8||
lines.transliteration_hindi: ते वा की सवतिह चहै सकै न मूरख पाइ ॥८॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: But people still liked her co-wife and this fool could not acquiesce.(8)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਪਰ) ਉਹ ਮੂਰਖ ਸਮਝ ਨਾ ਸਕੀ ਕਿ ਉਹ ਉਸ ਦੀ ਸੌਂਕਣ ਨੂੰ ਹੀ ਚਾਹੁੰਦੇ ਹਨ ॥੮॥

lines.gurmukhi: cOpeI ]
lines.transliteration_english: choupe'ee ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: चौपई ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Chaupaee

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਚੌਪਈ:

lines.gurmukhi: log sviq qw kI kh chY ]
lines.transliteration_english: log savat taa kee keh chahai ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: लोग सवति ता की कह चहै ॥

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਲੋਕੀਂ ਉਸ ਦੀ ਸੌਂਕਣ ਨੂੰ ਚਾਹੁੰਦੇ ਸਨ।

lines.gurmukhi: vw kI ausqiq inRp so khY ]
lines.transliteration_english: vaa kee ausatat nrip so kahai ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: वा की उसतति न्रिप सो कहै ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: People fancied her co-wife; they were full of her praise in the presence of the Raja. .

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਸ ਦੀ ਉਸਤਤ ਰਾਜੇ ਪਾਸ ਕਰਦੇ ਸਨ।

lines.gurmukhi: khY ju ieh pRBU brY, su mwro ]
lines.transliteration_english: kahai ju eih prabhoo barai su maaro ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: कहै जु इह प्रभू बरै सु मारो ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: People fancied her co-wife; they were full of her praise in the presence of the Raja. .

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕਹਿੰਦੇ ਸਨ ਕਿ ਇਸ ਨੂੰ ਰਾਜਾ ਵਿਆਹ ਲਏ (ਅਤੇ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ) ਮਾਰ ਦੇਵੇ।

lines.gurmukhi: AiDk tUkro clY hmwro ]9]
lines.transliteration_english: adhik Tookaro chalai hamaaro ||9||
lines.transliteration_hindi: अधिक टूकरो चलै हमारो ॥९॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She wanted Raja to eradicate her so that she could live happily.(9)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਤਾ ਜੋ) ਚੰਗੀ ਤਰ੍ਰਹਾ ਸਾਡਾ ਅੰਨ ਪਾਣੀ ਚਲਦਾ ਰਹੇ ॥੯॥

lines.gurmukhi: sviq qRws Aiq iqRXih idKwvY ]
lines.transliteration_english: savat traas at triyeh dhikhaavai ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: सवति त्रास अति त्रियहि दिखावै ॥

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਇਕ ਸੇਵਕਾ) ਉਸ ਰਾਣੀ ਨੂੰ ਸੌਂਕਣ ਦਾ ਬਹੁਤ ਡਰ ਦਿਖਾਦੀ ਸੀ

lines.gurmukhi: qw ko mUMf mUMf kir KwvY ]
lines.transliteration_english: taa ko moondd moondd kar khaavai ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: ता को मूंड मूंड करि खावै ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The dread of the co-wife always haunted her, and she always craved to annihilate her,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਲੁਟ ਲੁਟ ਕੇ ਖਾਦੀ ਸੀ।

lines.gurmukhi: qw kh drbu n dyKn dyhI ]
lines.transliteration_english: taa keh dharab na dhekhan dhehee ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: ता कह दरबु न देखन देही ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The dread of the co-wife always haunted her, and she always craved to annihilate her,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਧਨ ਦੇਖਣ ਨਹੀਂ ਸੀ ਦਿੰਦੀ,

lines.gurmukhi: lUit kUit bwhr qy lyhI ]10]
lines.transliteration_english: looT kooT baahar te lehee ||10||
lines.transliteration_hindi: लूटि कूटि बाहर ते लेही ॥१०॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She would not let money pass to her and plunder it when it was on its way to her (co-wife).(10)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਬਾਹਰੋਂ ਹੀ ਲੁਟ ਲੈਂਦੀ ਸੀ ॥੧੦॥

lines.gurmukhi: puin iqh imilih sviq sO jweI ]
lines.transliteration_english: pun tih milih savat so jaae'ee ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: पुनि तिह मिलिहि सवति सौ जाई ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She would not let money pass to her and plunder it when it was on its way to her (co-wife).(10)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਫਿਰ ਉਹ ਸੌਂਕਣ ਨੂੰ ਜਾ ਕੇ ਮਿਲਦੀ।

lines.gurmukhi: Bwiq Bwiq iqn krih bfweI ]
lines.transliteration_english: bhaat bhaat tin kareh baddaae'ee ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: भाति भाति तिन करहि बडाई ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: But she used to meet the co-wife as well and often praised her saying,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਭਾਤ ਭਾਤ ਦੀ ਉਸ ਦੀ ਵਡਿਆਈ ਕਰਦੀ ਸੀ

lines.gurmukhi: qum kh bir hY inRpiq hmwro ]
lines.transliteration_english: tum keh bar hai nripat hamaaro ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: तुम कह बरि है न्रिपति हमारो ॥

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕਿ ਸਾਡਾ ਰਾਜਾ ਤੈਨੂੰ ਵਿਆਹ ਲਏਗਾ

lines.gurmukhi: hÍYhY AiDk pRqwp qumwro ]11]
lines.transliteration_english: hvYaihai adhik prataap tumaaro ||11||
lines.transliteration_hindi: ह्वैहै अधिक प्रताप तुमारो ॥११॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: ‘Our Raja will retain you and your magnificence will flourish.’(11)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਤੇਰਾ ਬਹੁਤ ਪ੍ਰਤਾਪ ਹੋਏਗਾ ॥੧੧॥

lines.gurmukhi: XO kih kY qw kO Dn lUtih ]
lines.transliteration_english: yo keh kai taa ko dhan looTeh ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: यौ कहि कै ता कौ धन लूटहि ॥

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਇਸ ਤਰ੍ਰਹਾ ਕਹਿ ਕੇ ਉਸ ਦਾ ਧਨ ਲੁਟਦੀ ਸੀ

lines.gurmukhi: bhuir Awin vw iqRXw kh kUtih ]
lines.transliteration_english: bahur aan vaa triyaa keh kooTeh ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: बहुरि आनि वा त्रिया कह कूटहि ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Outwardly she robbed her of her wealth and beat her (mentally).

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਫਿਰ ਆ ਕੇ ਰਾਣੀ ਤੋਂ (ਧਨ) ਖਿਚਦੀ ਸੀ।

lines.gurmukhi: ieh ibD qRws iqnY idKrwvY ]
lines.transliteration_english: eih bidh traas tinai dhikharaavai ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: इह बिध त्रास तिनै दिखरावै ॥

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਇਸ ਤਰ੍ਰਹਾ ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਨੂੰ ਡਰ ਦਿੰਦੀ ਸੀ

lines.gurmukhi: duhUMAn mUMf mUMif kY KwvY ]12]
lines.transliteration_english: dhuhoonan moondd moondd kai khaavai ||12||
lines.transliteration_hindi: दुहूंअन मूंड मूंडि कै खावै ॥१२॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Advancing in such a way, she ransacked them both lavishly.(12)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਦੋਹਾ ਨੂੰ ਲੁਟ ਲੁਟ ਕੇ ਖਾਦੀ ਸੀ ॥੧੨॥

lines.gurmukhi: dohrw ]
lines.transliteration_english: dhoharaa ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: दोहरा ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Dohira

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਦੋਹਰਾ:

lines.gurmukhi: Aink Bwiq iqh inRpiq ko; duhUMAn qRws idKwie ]
lines.transliteration_english: anik bhaat tih nripat ko dhuhoonan traas dhikhaae ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: अनिक भाति तिह न्रिपति को दुहूंअन त्रास दिखाइ ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Thus, both of them, as a matter of fact, indulged in many deceits,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਇਸ ਤਰ੍ਰਹਾ ਉਹ ਦੋਹਾ ਨੂੰ ਰਾਜੇ ਦਾ ਡਰ ਦਰਸਾਦੀ ਸੀ

lines.gurmukhi: drbu jVin ky Dwm kO; ieh Cl Clih bnwie ]13]
lines.transliteration_english: dharab jaRan ke dhaam ko eih chhal chhaleh banaae ||13||
lines.transliteration_hindi: दरबु जड़नि के धाम कौ इह छल छलहि बनाइ ॥१३॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: As they ravaged the Raja’s wealth through trickery.(l3)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ ਮੂਰਖਾ ਨੂੰ ਇਸ ਤਰ੍ਰਹਾ ਲੁਟ ਕੇ ਖਾਦੀ ਸੀ ॥੧੩॥

lines.gurmukhi: cOpeI ]
lines.transliteration_english: choupe'ee ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: चौपई ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Chaupaee

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਚੌਪਈ:

lines.gurmukhi: sviq qRws jV drbu lutwvY ]
lines.transliteration_english: savat traas jaR dharab luTaavai ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: सवति त्रास जड़ दरबु लुटावै ॥

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸੌਂਕਣ ਦੇ ਡਰੋਂ (ਉਹ) ਮੂਰਖ ਧਨ ਲੁਟਾਉਣ ਲਗੀ ਸੀ

lines.gurmukhi: durwcwr suq hyq kmwvY ]
lines.transliteration_english: dhuraachaar sut het kamaavai ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: दुराचार सुत हेत कमावै ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She had been laundering money foolishly and indulging in base action

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਪੁੱਤਰ (ਦੀ ਪ੍ਰਾਪਤੀ) ਲਈ ਦੁਰਾਚਾਰ ਕਰਦੀ ਸੀ।

lines.gurmukhi: AiDk pRIiq iqn ky sMg TwnY ]
lines.transliteration_english: adhik preet tin ke sang ttaanai ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: अधिक प्रीति तिन के संग ठानै ॥

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਨ੍ਰਹਾ (ਪ੍ਰੇਮੀਆਂ) ਨਾਲ ਅਧਿਕ ਪ੍ਰੀਤ ਕਰਦੀ ਸੀ,

lines.gurmukhi: mUrK nwir Byd nih jwnY ]14]
lines.transliteration_english: moorakh naar bhedh neh jaanai ||14||
lines.transliteration_hindi: मूरख नारि भेद नहि जानै ॥१४॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She loved many shady characters who could not understand this foolish woman.(14)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਪਰ (ਉਹ) ਮੂਰਖ ਇਸਤਰੀ ਭੇਦ ਨੂੰ ਨਹੀਂ ਸਮਝਦੀ ਸੀ ॥੧੪॥
